an4.220:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.220:4.3: They’re faithless, unethical, lazy, and witless.
an4.220:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.220:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.220:5.3: They’re faithful, ethical, energetic, and wise.
an4.220:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
